Currency.BloodPointsDesc:
BLOODPOINTS are your CHARACTER PROGRESSION currency. They are used to upgrade the characters you own by making purchases in the Bloodweb. Most in-game actions trigger scoring events that are converted into Bloodpoints at the end of the match. Certain offerings, perks, and events may modify the amount of Bloodpoints you receive.

  • Bloodpoints are capped at 2,000,000.
Currency.CURRENCY_BloodPointsAtlanta_DESC:
BLOODPOINTS are your currency. They are used to purchase ITEMS, ADD-ONS and OFFERINGS in the BLOODMARKET.
Most In-game actions trigger scoring events that are converted into BloodPoints at the end of a match.

Certains add-ons, offerings, perks and events may modify the amount of BloodPoints you receive.

BloodPoints are capped at 1,000,000.
Currency.CURRENCY_HalloweenEventCurrency_DESC:
PUTRID SERUM is a STORE currency used exclusively to purchase the HALLOWED BLIGHT and HALLOWED CATALYST customization items.

Putrid Serum may only be acquired from the Rift in Tome I of The Archives.

  • Putrid Serum will expire 2 weeks after this Rift closes.
Currency.CURRENCY_HardCurrencyAtlanta_DESC:
AURIC CELLS are your STORE currency. They are used to purchase characters and customization items in the store. Auric Cells can only be acquired through purchase in the in-game store or earned as rewards in the Login Calendar and by completing Daily Rituals. Purchasing full outfits with Auric Cells will often grant a discount.

  • Auric Cells are not capped.
Currency.CURRENCY_LunarNewYearCoins_DESC:
Golden Coins are a STORE currency, used exclusively to purchase MOONRISE event customization items.

Golden Coins may only be acquired during the Moonrise event.

  • Golden Coins will expire shortly after the event has ended.
Currency.CURRENCY_ShardsAtlanta_DESC:
IRIDESCENT SHARDS are your PLAYER PROGRESSION currency. These may be used to purchase characters and customization items in the store. They are acquired by gaining experience points (XP), increasing your Player Level and completing Daily Rituals.

  • Iridescent Shards are not capped.
Currency.HalloweenCoinsDesc:
PUTRID SERUM is a STORE currency, used exclusively to purchase THE HALLOWED BLIGHT event customization items.

Putrid Serum may only be acquired during the Halloween 2018 event.

  • Putrid Serum will expire shortly after the event has ended.
Currency.HardCurrencyDesc:
AURIC CELLS are your STORE and ARCHIVE currency. They are used to purchase characters and customization items in the store, or Rift Passes and progression in the Archive. Auric Cells can only be acquired through purchase in the in-game store or earned as rewards in the Archive Rift. Purchasing full outfits with Auric Cells will often grant a discount.

  • Auric Cells are not capped.
Currency.ShardsDesc:
IRIDESCENT SHARDS are your PLAYER PROGRESSION currency. These may be used to purchase characters, customization items, and perks from the Shrine of Secrets. They are acquired by gaining experience points (XP) and increasing your Player Level.

  • Iridescent Shards are not capped.

CustomizationItemDB.GS_Head014_UIData_Description: A crown made with wildflowers hand-picked by Kate herself.
CustomizationItemDB.B65F79BF492328388AFB6E9613ABD412: A big hairstyle that pushes the hair up and adorns it with an eye-catching bow.
CustomizationItemDB.C5DD617646BFF4E89F7164B70D8B8FEA: Cool and relaxed, wherever the sun shines.
CustomizationItemDB.DF098A6748B8BF6DF9C240A924E840A0: A wide straw hat to protect her head from the blazing sun on a hot summer day.
CustomizationItemDB.B2F4131640922A5E3D8D87BA95AD9436: Loose ponytail adorned with beret for a chic, yet casual look.
CustomizationItemDB.B99DECAC4F844578FA1AC4803EFBB03D: She’d feel out of place back home if she weren’t wearing one of these.
CustomizationItemDB.50B9D5EF451E27288CCBF19CE2815A80: This soldier’s lineage made her a target, forcing her to assume a false identity.
CustomizationItemDB.F18E3A784FE83C69D980A58543CCA6C7: This microphone allowed to her move around the entire stage with her guitar.
CustomizationItemDB.681400D34C2E78CEBBDE2B85879D162C: She borrowed this hat from a local scarecrow and put a cute sunflower on top.
CustomizationItemDB.B303E93647120DA0F8392E84799FC111: Her neighbors expected something run-of-the-mill, but she insisted on taking her concert to the next level.
CustomizationItemDB.GS_Legs014_UIData_Description: The blouse of a Bavarian-inspired dirndl, draped with a pattern of roses.
CustomizationItemDB.31999FD040976B56A57A26A8BC72C757: A 50’s inspired skirt, paired with shoes that feature miniature microphone clip-ons.
CustomizationItemDB.356660D640506C7DAC95468BEE97B830: Flowy, breezy, and as cool as they come.
CustomizationItemDB.9D153A834617E7B26DCFF785AA8BB528: Sturdy pair of leather sandals, both flexible and durable.
CustomizationItemDB.4C9CDB71409F52DF64F2709E66664499: Ruby red dress matched with thigh-high black boots for the special occasion.
CustomizationItemDB.56A1F1704D8D1D22271011A0017CFDD7: She made the most of her time off, walking through the forests and dreaming up new songs.
CustomizationItemDB.8A9F7A584388146CF77AFABCB8294634: Someone special once told her to live a life she is proud of, and she tries to live up to that duty every day.
CustomizationItemDB.1ABB236A462D00789ABAF69FADD815A2: A surprisingly effective combination of mobility and protection.
CustomizationItemDB.E7C3A50245BB6CB97636AEAF0E4F7337: There was plenty of extra quilt fabric lying around, so she turned some old jeans into scarecrow attire.
CustomizationItemDB.48AE261A425EEAEED2036CB7606A79E9: As she paced around the stage, the skirt followed her like the tail of a comet.
CustomizationItemDB.GS_Torso014_UIData_Description: The bodice of a Bavarian-inspired dirndl, adorned with flowers.
CustomizationItemDB.7804B121447576214D2486AF67165590: A jacket and top that puts the rock in rockabilly.
CustomizationItemDB.D7D0715A4C198F602DEAD19A88993317: A cross wrap halter top that dominates the beach.
CustomizationItemDB.AACF22F146746D8F35D23CB87C932E66: Inspired to create new songs, she headed to the park and wrote lyrics by the cascading fountain.
CustomizationItemDB.4AB5BFF7404CA53A48EB30BF61992899: Light jacket thrown over her red, heart-patterned dress. Matched with a leather purse accessorized with red roses.
CustomizationItemDB.6025C55D4DEA155E964DE0A92AB0B5EA: A t-shirt decorated with the logo of her favorite band, The Ungrateful Sons.
CustomizationItemDB.5FE261F84C64DE451DE15396A5C53C8F: She was raised to believe she was a mistake, and often wished she had never been born.
CustomizationItemDB.A168ADAE4059E89540892F85372D3F9C: A dazzling top that catches the eye and never lets it go.
CustomizationItemDB.6027BBED46BEA730A2FDF484BE92E42A: It got a little itchy, but it was worth it for the prank.
CustomizationItemDB.D96D23424369F0C49F06F487801876C8: It sparked and shone gloriously, allowing her to outshine the small stage she performed on.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_002_UIData_Description: The more you see, the more you learn.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_003_UIData_Description: A sharper focus for those who go deeper than most.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_004_UIData_Description: Opening the gates of awareness provides perception that goes beyond the ordinary.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_006_UIData_Description: A lively arcade as a symbol for what life is truly about.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_007_UIData_Description: An acute awareness that reveals those in pain.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_008_UIData_Description: The first house plant Claudette got for her dorm after leaving Montréal.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_009_UIData_Description: An expert botanist, Claudette Morel was a brilliant science student with a prolific future—that is until she took a stroll that changed her life forever.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_011_UIData_Description: The perfect tool to ensnare all kinds of prey.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_012_UIData_Description: A shadow creeping up the wall, an eerie presence lurking. Few know what this sadistic plaything is up to next.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_014_UIData_Description: A sadistic grin for a night of trick-or-terror.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_015_UIData_Description: The corporation that mined both minerals and human lives.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_016_UIData_Description: The crest of those brave enough to venture through the black Fog.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_017_UIData_Description: A challenging mechanical part that rewards the bold and punishes the reckless.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_018_UIData_Description: Hope can be the deadliest trap. Strike when they believe the worst is behind them. They'll be ripe for the taking.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_019_UIData_Description: There are many hidden tunnels, caution signs, and blocked exits on the MacMillan estate. Everyone suspected the mine was used for something else…
CustomizationItemDB.RW_020_UIData_Description: No one can escape the clutches of a skilled, bloodthirsty hunter. No matter the chase, no matter the prey, death is the result.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_021_UIData_Description: A badge that signals a profound loyalty to The Entity. There is no greater thrill than to fuel what urges to kill.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_022_UIData_Description: A catatonic patient used to play with this horse, until his nurse suffocated him with his toy.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_023_UIData_Description: A rare flower secreting a thick, pungent nectar during the “Hallowed Blight,” according to Vigo's journal.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_024_UIData_Description: A glass vial filled with nectar, which can be distilled into a putrid serum that holds unknown properties.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_025_UIData_Description: Setting up traps around the mine was easy. He'd watch rodents suffer, squirming while waiting for the inevitable. Suddenly, he had all the power in the world.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_026_UIData_Description: He ventured outside for a new challenge. Each day he'd practice how to patrol areas in the woods to catch more challenging prey.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_027_UIData_Description: Nothing is more fulfilling than to hunt a pack of opponents. This he learned early on while hunting with his father.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_028_UIData_Description: Hunting bears was his next move. They offered a real challenge, being stronger and bolder. He designed a special set of steel-jaw traps for the occasion.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_029_UIData_Description: No limits. Everything was fair game now. Even humans... Especially humans...
CustomizationItemDB.RW_030_UIData_Description: She found the branch of Biology that spoke to her soul.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_031_UIData_Description: She discovered the nature of plants and their medicinal properties.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_032_UIData_Description: She studied the taxonomic diversity of plants, training her eye to recognize each kind.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_033_UIData_Description: She began experimenting with plants to produce an array of chemical substances.
CustomizationItemDB.RW_034_UIData_Description: Her in-depth understanding of each species' uniqueness inspired her techniques that targeted their differences. The specimen in her care always grew faster, stronger, and healthier.
CustomizationItemDB.S22_Head008_UIData_Description: The blonde-haired cop was a welcome sight in The Fog. She had gentle eyes beneath her tough exterior, the kind you can immediately trust.
CustomizationItemDB.0D520B364C2B75BA3425289C0C8FA61D: Sullen, he travels to the remote town of Silent Hill, to their “special place”.
CustomizationItemDB.942A693D48C02FDD58C6B7AA582B3972: She stays one step ahead of danger with these sensitive antennae.
CustomizationItemDB.S22_Legs008_UIData_Description: The dark pants given to officers of the Brahm’s police department. Sadly, the holster is empty.
CustomizationItemDB.2EDADF3348B45318AF26E48028AB0851: A comfortable pair of loose-fitting jeans with black leather shoes.
CustomizationItemDB.3AFF970E4BD0ACC3034366A77620BAF7: This flared footwear may look more fashionable than functional, but many foes failed to finish her when she fought in these.
CustomizationItemDB.S22_Torso008_UIData_Description: The uniform given to officers of the Brahm’s police department. The gold emblem carries a tone of authority.
CustomizationItemDB.7F3182C144C38C82DDCF44BDA5C8CCA9: A warm, sturdy coat to face the haunting mist of Silent Hill.
CustomizationItemDB.63915B8E427B94DD10D82D85727A5EDF: The costume she wore while moonlighting as a romantic crimefighter.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_002_UIData_Description: An item originating from Terra Primus and manifested by the Rift. The third eye seems to imply deep-seeded knowledge or perhaps a psychic connection.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_003_UIData_Description: An item originating from Terra Primus and manifested by the Rift. There is something reassuring about the golden scarab upon it.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_004_UIData_Description: An item originating from Terra Primus and manifested by the Rift. The flower radiates with luminous light.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_005_UIData_Description: A symbol of winter, cold to the touch.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_006_UIData_Description: David enjoyed a good ol' fashioned dust-up, but when things got out of hand, the brass came out.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_007_UIData_Description: And the winner for outstanding information series is… Jane Romero!
CustomizationItemDB.TO_008_UIData_Description: A short-tempered brawler, David enjoyed starting his day with a pint and a punch-up.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_010_UIData_Description: A humble prize awarded after a string of exhausting battles.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_011_UIData_Description: Something dark in her family's past suffocates the bloodline.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_012_UIData_Description: A clever creature, one can't help but admire its ability to thrive in nearly any land.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_013_UIData_Description: Wishing longevity in a realm of terror and torture may be more akin to a curse.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_015_UIData_Description: Without a magic hat, the snowman is fortunate enough to not have a soul to be beaten, worn, and broken.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_016_UIData_Description: A unique solution for those who want more murder in their Christmas holidays.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_017_UIData_Description: 5, 4, 3… "I'm Jane Romero, and that is it for us today. We'll leave you with Corral Harp and a cut off her new album."
CustomizationItemDB.TO_018_UIData_Description: A charm for warding off evil, Kazan wore it when he left home to fulfill his destiny.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_019_UIData_Description: There's something striking about how blood contrasts against a snowy white sheet.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_020_UIData_Description: The Doctor rejected notions that his job was simple torture. This was science.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_021_UIData_Description: A light to guide your way into the new lunar cycle.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_022_UIData_Description: A lucky silk bag that carries good fortune.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_023_UIData_Description: There may be potential, but it's overgrown with doubt.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_024_UIData_Description: A watchful eye can see growth, slight as it may be.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_025_UIData_Description: The sprigs press forward with quiet confidence.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_026_UIData_Description: The branches expand upon the sturdy base.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_027_UIData_Description: The roots tear through the dirt, strangling all they encounter.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_028_UIData_Description: A powerful beast, spoiled on arrogance.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_029_UIData_Description: A powerful beast, relegated to the barren plains.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_030_UIData_Description: A powerful beast, saved from extinction.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_031_UIData_Description: A powerful beast, savage and bloody.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_032_UIData_Description: A powerful beast, loyal and respected.
CustomizationItemDB.TO_033_UIData_Description: Reminder of a time when the only thing hanging on hooks were Christmas ornaments.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body006_UIData_Description: He suffered through convalescence to make a bold come back.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body01_01_UIData_Description: He went to his workshop and immersed himself in his work to take on this new job.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body01_02_UIData_Description: He went to his workshop and immersed himself in his work to take on this new job.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body01_03_UIData_Description: He went to his workshop and immersed himself in his work to take on this new job.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body01_CV02_UIData_Description: A formal shirt that reminds him he's got a job to do.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body01_CV03_UIData_Description: A formal shirt that reminds him he's got a job to do.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body01_CV04_UIData_Description: A formal shirt that reminds him he's got a job to do.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body02_01_UIData_Description: Though the man was seriously injured, he was alive and ready for incarceration.
CustomizationItemDB.E8999A714A31A822830C15BE7044483F: Though the man was seriously injured, he was alive and ready for incarceration.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Body02_UIData_Description: Though the man was seriously injured, he was alive and ready for incarceration.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Head006_UIData_Description: A bloody gang war ensued, with Bayshore and the prison warden backing separate side.​
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Head01_01_UIData_Description: He used his ingenuity to find how to bring in outlaws—not dead, but alive.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Head01_02_UIData_Description: He used his ingenuity to find how to bring in outlaws—not dead, but alive.​
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Head01_03_UIData_Description: He used his ingenuity to find how to bring in outlaws—not dead, but alive.​
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Head02_01_UIData_Description: Using a snow storm as cover, he ambushed his mark and clamped him in a metal spear.
CustomizationItemDB.183F9E474F83543C5CD5A88093469639: Using a snowstorm as cover, he ambushed his mark and clamped him in a metal spear.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_Head02_UIData_Description: Using a snow storm as cover, he ambushed his mark and clamped him in a metal spear.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W006_UIData_Description: First day back on the job and he was capturing the leader of the notorious Mason Kelly Gang. While the act immediately gained him recognition as a top bounty hunter, it also put him in the crosshairs of vengeful outlaws.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W01_01_UIData_Description: When he emerged, he carried the prototype of a pressure-based spear gun.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W01_02_UIData_Description: When he emerged, he carried the prototype of a pressure-based spear gun.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W01_03_UIData_Description: When he emerged, he carried the prototype of a pressure-based spear gun.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W01_CV02_UIData_Description: Some wrongs must be washed in blood to be forgotten. And even then, they can never be forgiven.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W01_CV03_UIData_Description: Some wrongs must be washed in blood to be forgotten. And even then, they can never be forgiven.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W01_CV04_UIData_Description: Some wrongs must be washed in blood to be forgotten. And even then, they can never be forgiven.
CustomizationItemDB.UK_W02_01_UIData_Description: It was the first successful test of the pressure-based spear.​ From that moment, the number of disemboweled victims quickly trailed off.​
CustomizationItemDB.02A78C914CBAF3BA410518B215969DDF: It was the first successful test of the pressure-based spear. From that moment, the number of disemboweled victims quickly trailed off.

Messages.PrivateMatch_Description_Html:
• 2 to 5 players can play.
  • All players can switch roles in the lobby.
  • The match can start when there is 1 Killer, no more, no less!
  • Items, add-ons, perks, and offerings collected in other modes can be used; they will not be lost.
  • No Bloodpoints are earned.
  • No items, add-ons. or offerings are earned.
  • You cannot gain or lose Grades.

Messages.ReportPlayerPrompt_Exploits:
EXPLOITS
Report this player for exploiting bugs, errors in design, or cheats to obtain a competitive advantage.
Messages.ReportPlayerPrompt_Griefing:
GRIEFING: INTENTIONAL GAMEPLAY ABUSE / TROLLING
Report this player for intentionally using abilities or game mechanics to the detriment of the game. Examples: Taking the game hostage, body blocking, working with the Killer.
Messages.ReportPlayerPrompt_Harassment:
HARASSMENT: COMMUNICATION ABUSE
Report this player for abusive behavior in the chat channel. Examples: Insults, intimidation, hateful speech, harassment.
Messages.ReportPlayerPrompt_Props:
GIVE PROPS
Give this player props! Examples: Helpful in securing objectives, a rock star at rescuing, knowledgeable of the game, fun to play against.
Messages.ReportPlayerPrompt_Unsportsmanlike:
UNSPORTSMANLIKE
Report this player for purposefully losing the game, not participating in or disconnecting from the game early to avoid defeat. Examples: AFKing, rage quitting, idling, and refusing to participate in normal gameplay.

SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_001_Description: Open shirt Felix was a good start but he needs to go fully shirtless.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_003_Description: First match does not count unless the killer brings a mori
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_004_Description: Twitter on release day is everything! #DeadbyDaylgiht
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_005_Description: I just woke up on a cold October morning and BOOP! I was the new Dead by Daylight survivor!?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_006_Description: It's one thing to create trailers for an audience, but getting to see the fans dissect every trailer we put out for anything hidden makes working on Dead by Daylight that much sweeter!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_007_Description: The Ringu chapter was the first major chapter I got to work on, so Sadako will always have a special place in my heart <3
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_008_Description: A great monster design is one that makes you question its intentions, but true monsters are all about the act!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_009_Description: Most people might have nightmares with monsters chasing them, but I fear to be the monster in mines.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_010_Description: Da da dum, dum, dum... another bug bites the dust...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_011_Description: Me as the QA team carries me through yet another playtest
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_012_Description: It was a blast to work on the Hellraiser chapter! Without having seen the movies prior to finding out we were going to work with the license, I knew exactly who Pinhead was – specifically because I was terrified of the VHS cover when I was a kid.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_013_Description: Before the PTB, anticipation is always very high. It was amazing to see all the reactions. Sadako is such a horror icon and I never would have imagined I'd get the honour to work on such an awesome character!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_153_Description: There will always be a special place in my heart for these two.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_014_Description: In 2019, I heard about the Hellraiser franchise for the first time and was so creeped out like "I'll never go near those movies!" In 2021, I was so happy to start working at Behaviour... on Dead by Daylight's Hellraiser chapter! Demon to 2019 me, Angel to 2021 me!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_015_Description: Working on Mikaela and the whole The Midnight Grove event made Halloween 2021 the most Halloweeny Halloween of my life! Keep that cauldron boiling and the book of spells close by... Wanna go Trick or Treating? Play Dead by Daylight, you get both!!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_016_Description: Blood sacrifice every morning = great internet
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_017_Description: I pray to Khorne everytime I submit code, does that count ?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_018_Description: The Dev team really wanted to have this chapter: we had to put a Ringu on it.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_019_Description: Did you know that Moira Rose could have starred as Carmina Mora in Portrait of a Murder?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_020_Description: I wonder if Dr. Horrible would make a great outfit for our old friend, The Doctor.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_021_Description: When I was being interviewed @ BHVR I was asked what my dream chapter would be. I said Ringu without hesitation. Seeing it come to fruition, w/ the love that was poured into it, and expanding the world's lore with Yoichi has been an absolute joy.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_022_Description: The creation of IntoTheRainbow. As a Queer person, It meant so much to be able to work on an event like that w/the team. To see the community band together, raise money for charity, and showcase incredible LGBTQIA2s+ streamers & Fog Whisperers was <3
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_024_Description: They wouldn't let me be a character in the game, they said there was already a cannibal...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_025_Description: Why did the chicken cross the road? The hatch was on the other side. Get it? Cause it's a hatch...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_026_Description: Whenever I'm getting ready for a vacation, other players always end up sending me to Ormond
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_027_Description: I can only imagine how hot those desks are right now with all three dev kits stacked on top of each other...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_028_Description: Well, well, well. It is that time again. Anyone for Sadako playtest?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_029_Description: Something smells like crispy semiconductors...it's quite possible that I will disappear unexpectedly today.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_030_Description: It was such a killer experience bringing Sadako to life! Pun wholeheartedly intended. I watched the original Ringu several times to stay as true as possible to her original sound design - which was a pleasure because the movie is great, and its sound is fantastic!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_031_Description: The box - you opened it, and he came! Bringing Pinhead's iconic voice lines to the gameplay experience may have had some hiccups, but it was so worth to hear Doug Bradley in game! Did you know one of his voice lines will only trigger in one of 2 very specific circumstances? You shall not escape!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_032_Description: It was so cool to be able to bring the Chatterer to Dead by Daylight alongside Pinhead - like his teeth clattering sfx? They're real teeth! - nothing else sounded quite right.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_033_Description: Don't tell the others, but you're my favourite person in this match.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_034_Description: "Hey, can you come over here and puke on me real quick?" is not something I expected to hear at work. But here we are.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_035_Description: I was going to tell a joke about Coldwind Farm, but it's too corny.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_037_Description: I've been working on a really great quote for the Anniversary. Not ready to share any details right now but you'll hear more soon!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_038_Description: Remember to play with your food
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_039_Description: If Sadako gave you a heart attack from her jump scares... that was from me!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_040_Description: A Jake in PJs means business
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_042_Description: Fun fact - A lot of the recent characters we've released have been voiced by incredibly talented metal vocalists!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_043_Description: A real gentleman is a killer who turns his head after hooking a lady.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_045_Description: My girlfriend is easy to scare when playing Dead by Daylight... Yes... Even when she's the Killer...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_046_Description: Look at that dream team! They can take on any monsters coming their way... Nemesis who?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_047_Description: Seeing Resident Evil join the Dead by Daylight roster has been the highlight of the year for me. Oh, I love the smell of zombies in the morning!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_048_Description: I've always loved that image of The Deathslinger. I can definitely hear him say "Get off my lawn!"
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_049_Description: I can only lament at how many bugs this guy's box caused me.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_050_Description: This dude unhooks your girl on the final gen, wyd?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_051_Description: The amount of true horror icons still finding their way into the fog is amazing! Who's next?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_052_Description: Whenever our licensed characters get some cosmetic love or even extra lore in The Archives, I'm very excited!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_054_Description: Have you ever wondered who observes the Observer?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_055_Description: I think we may have created an irrational fear of real life snowmen with this event... Well done, team!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_056_Description: The S.T.A.R.S. are shining in Dead by Daylight! This was a huge highlight for me as a Resident Evil fan. If you missed it from the Anniversary broadcast, expect more Resident Evil in the future! ;)
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_057_Description: It's nice to hop into games and know I'm among family when I see all the Pride charms, even if it's decorating the hook I'm hanging from.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_058_Description: If you see a Survivor named "INEED4PALLETSTUNS", it's me and I'm still stuck on the last Tome I Survivor Master Challenge. Just let me pallet stun you four times, you bullies.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_059_Description: Felix in this outfit makes me SWEAT
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_060_Description: Thanks to all of our fans around the world!!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_061_Description: Nothing's better than a big steak. Maybe 2 big steaks.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_063_Description: I love a cheesy pizza. It's brie-lliant to share with friends or even when you're prov-alone.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_065_Description: In doing the research needed to design the Trapper update in 5.3.0, I came to love playing him. There is little as satisfying in Dead by Daylight as hearing a Survivor step on a Bear-Trap. There are so many clever tricks you can do with Bear-Trap placement!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_066_Description: One of the coolest things I've gotten to work on recently was my idea to have the Legion's Mixtapes change their music. The audio team and the composer knocked that one right out of the park! Thanks so much for bringing it to life, Fred and Michel!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_067_Description: Reworking Ghost Face sent me into the DEPTHS of the Ghost Face fandom, and WOW! New fav killer.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_068_Description: Confession: Killer main because I get too scared to hit skill checks when I hear a heartbeat (especially against Doctor)
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_069_Description: Legion is my favorite killer on Dead by Daylight. When they told me that I was going to work on his rework, I was very happy! I really enjoyed working on it and I like the final result! I hope you have fun playing with it!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_070_Description: The introduction of the All-Kill chapter was my favorite. The video was beautiful and the music was amazing! When this DLC came out, I told my mom to look at it and since then The Trickster is her favorite Killer. When I play as or against him, my mother comes to watch the match!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_071_Description: What an incredible year! Thanks to my awesome colleagues and to all of you for being such a great community! I love working on this game and I still love playing it! If you see a bambi playing with a flashlight and a pink bunny outfit, that's probably me!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_072_Description: We rack our brains every day to convert all information to funny, humorous, and casual messages to deliver to you. Smiling is the key to a happy life! May your life be filled with smiles and laughs, whether you're playing video games or not.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_073_Description: Sadako is very popular in Japan as there are a lot who know her. It was a long-cherished desire to invite her into the Fog for many Japanese players, including myself. I'll never forget the reaction in and out of the community when we announced it!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_074_Description: I'll never forget that our pun-filled Valentine's Day cards (that we racked our brains to come up with) became actual merch and were sold in Japan!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_075_Description: Don't worry, everything is gonna be all-Dwight!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_078_Description: Where's the cake? I SAID IT NEEDS MORE CAKE!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_079_Description: Is Charlotte technically Victor's house? These are the kind of questions that keep me up at night ...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_080_Description: I started playing Dead by Daylight in 2016 and now I get to be a part of this amazing team - It's an honor and a privilege!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_082_Description: When it comes to our characters, less is more - clothing that is :)
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_083_Description: I love working on teasers where I get to hide things for the community to find. Who knew adding a needle into a screenshot would cause such a ruckus?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_084_Description: In loving memory of Leon S. Kennedy. He's not dead, I just love remembering him.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_154_Description: Dead by Daylight girls, it's going down!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_085_Description: If you look like this my DMs are open.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_086_Description: Life is pain. But I brought cake and I can sing.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_087_Description: This is a quiet day. Only 3 meetings between 11:00 and 11:30.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_089_Description: How does that work? Usually, the answer involves dark magic and far too many tentacles for comfort.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_090_Description: I'm trying to be smarter and it's not going well.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_091_Description: Why can't all events have "Bone" in the name?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_092_Description: If you thought I would be good at certain maps after testing on them 8 hours a day for weeks on end...you are wrong.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_093_Description: I loved the two-sided story for CRESCENDO! I'm hoping we get more in the future like this.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_094_Description: "What a fine night for having a lovely stroll in a decrepit auto parts yard. It seems some fine folks are even hard at work, servicing some motors or whatnot. Say, who's this fine gentleman charging at me at full speed?" -Thomas' last words.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_096_Description: To all Sadako "Rotten Remains" players - and YOU, too -  I share this message: "Don't give up, skeleton!"
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_097_Description: To the players that give the other team a break when they are dominating: keep being awesome!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_098_Description: Working on the Archives this long has been a joy! Here's for more lore!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_099_Description: 6 years already? Time flies when you're living on the edge!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_100_Description: The Entity is watching. Just to be sure... shut that closet and look under the bed tonight...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_101_Description: Some of y'all really need a good bonking
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_102_Description: Come on in, have a bite of some cake
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_104_Description: Sending you to the Cage of Atonement is going to hurt me more than it's going to hurt you
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_105_Description:
Jonah finally picked the lock open of the basement chest. A chill ran down his spine, as he found nothing but a torn note inside. Inscribed was the sequence:
72,6D,34,47,48,6D,4C,51,77,2D,45.
Dwight exclaimed "What could it possibly mean?!"
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_106_Description: To practice my hatchets, I made a playground in the game editor with snowmen as targets. Don't tell my boss.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_107_Description:
Ever get those crows from staying still too long? In code, the rate at which you get them is referred to as the "ChickenShitModifier".

The more you know!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_108_Description: I love Mythology and Legends so when I was a player of Dead by Daylight and the Krampus Skin came up I knew it was one I had to get! To this day its my favourite outfit, shortly followed by Oni's Minotaur! If only I was good enough at Trapper to play with it more.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_109_Description: They say this image is the last thing you see before you die...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_110_Description: The Artist really has a pretty long neck, doesn't she? I think it's at least a full foot, maybe 2.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_111_Description: ''Hello, we've been trying to reach you concerning your vehicle's extended warranty.''
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_112_Description: The past 6 years have truly been amazing. I'm grateful to have been a part of everything that we've done, and to everyone on the project and our community for making Dead by Daylight what it is. To Dead by Daylight, and many more years to come!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_113_Description: Tora, this is your reminder to ready up after this match!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_114_Description:
Don't worry, I've got you - I have a flashlight!
Successfully blinds the Killer but does not get the save
... DAMMIT!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_115_Description: Sacrificing my colleagues and hearing their screams during our playtest is the most satisfying thing in my life right now.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_116_Description: Never thought I would be attracted to a serial killer from a game...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_117_Description: I think Dead by Daylight's best years are still to come and I can't wait to see the reaction to all the new chapters we have cooking!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_118_Description: When the club hits your eye, from a big demon guy, that's a mori~
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_119_Description: Ah, that tingling feeling once you finally close an Epic that had 560 tasks!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_120_Description: Yup, that's me during allergy season! Hey, team!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_121_Description: And who's idea was it to go out on a team picnic in March?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_123_Description: Fun fact: Dog-Sitter outsold Cat Fostering by a small margin. Step it up, cat people!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_124_Description: I'm sorry for teleporting you into a wall! I just wanted to show you guys this bug!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_125_Description: When you're a bird lover and needs to fight the urge of petting the dire crows.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_126_Description: When you work on a gen on some cool beat until you realize it comes from Legion who is right behind you...ready to stab. Instant panic.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_127_Description: We enjoyed every jumpscare video you've shared for Sadako! A lot! Thank you :P
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_128_Description: Life is full of suffering, especially when you are on a hook!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_129_Description: I swear it wasn't me that placed that totem
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_130_Description: I'd like to thank my friends for carrying me through SWF matches because, even with hundreds of hours in-game and working on the project, I will continue to need rescuing!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_132_Description: These unused icons are so mysterious... I wonder if it's some kind of code? If only I could... spell it out. What's in a (file) name anyways?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_133_Description: It's hard to be a savvy Survivor in playtests when I'm usually sitting two inches from my monitor yelling, "No no! Hit me more!! I need to see the HUD animation again."
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_134_Description: I will never stop being amazed by Dead by Daylight's dedicated fan-artists and cosplayers. Y'all are friggin' amazing!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_135_Description: The true survivor is neither seen by the killer... nor their teammates.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_136_Description: A good survivor is a dead survivor!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_139_Description: I think I SAW what you did there...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_140_Description: Being a part of something this awesome with a community this passionate has left me in a true puddle of joy <3
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_141_Description: It's the hour to be THAT witch.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_142_Description: Why don't we just wait here for a little while, see what happens?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_144_Description: How do y'all like these rocks? I sculpted them with much care for you to hide away and not be killed
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_145_Description: How to spot a 3D Artist playing Dead by Daylight: Character keeps circling around same random object over and over again
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_146_Description: Brag alert: I have almost 4k hours on Dead by Daylight so far (sunglasses emoji) What?? Since when do work hours not count?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_147_Description: The moment I realized I was playing Funeral Clothes Dressup Simulator... well, gosh, I never lost another match.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_148_Description: Designing new outfits has been a blast. The drip is on!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_149_Description: Having a Chinese New Year celebration is amazing, I'm glad for this small but wonderful representation!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_150_Description: Those plush suits creep me out quite a bit. No, quite a lot in fact.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_151_Description: Even during a global pandemic the team found time to grab a drink in the park to meet their new colleagues
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.Anniversary2022_152_Description: Perfect way to start the day, is coffee and gaming.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_02_01_Description: I think we did a pretty good job, so far.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_02_02_Description: Don't forget to call your mom.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_02_03_Description: Thank you! Yes, YOU! If you weren't playing this game, all of us would have to be working on something else. And working on DbD is just awesome!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_04_01_Description: Sometimes you don't realize it but your ears are actually very scared.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_04_02_Description: Did you know that the footstep sounds are actually the sound of real feet recorded in their natural environment? No feet were harmed or endangered during the recording process.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_04_03_Description: The loud chase music is here to cover the sounds of the survivors in order to give them a chance to escape.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_05_01_Description: When all seems lost, boop the snoot for extra chance of survival.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_06_01_Description: Who put confetti all over my code?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_08_01_Description: Back before Alpha, Matt Cote asked for some name suggestions for the Killer who eventually became The Trapper. Being a goof, I suggested "Chuckles". Turns out other folks liked it and that was his in-game name up until Beta! He'll always be my sweet boy.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_08_02_Description: Sometimes I make extra icons and put them in the build files for people to find. What could they mean? So mysterious...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_08_03_Description: You will pry Urban Evasion from my cold dead hands. I love the scooch too much!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_09_01_Description: Please don't kill me! I have kids and children!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_10_01_Description: Seeing cosplays and fanart of the characters we create is so damn wild!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_12_01_Description: 99 little bugs in the game, 99 little bugs. Take one down, patch it around, 103 little bugs in the game!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_13_01_Description: Why are you running? The fun is just beginning!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_14_01_Description: Is this a feature or a bug?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_15_01_Description: While everyone was fixing generators in playtests, I was fixing them for real!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_15_02_Description: Your lucky coin will be unlucky, tough luck.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_16_01_Description: Don't you dare drop that pallet on me, Justin!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_16_03_Description: In theory, it should be working.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_17_01_Description: Have you tried playing DbD while commuting to work?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_18_01_Description: Yeah, it's probably supposed to bend that way.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_20_01_Description: Looks like The Wraith's Mori file location has moved. Ring a bell to anyone?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_23_01_Description: Work on your cardio, it could be useful!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_23_02_Description: Even if you're a noob, you still have a place in the party. Being the bait is a huge honor!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_24_01_Description: An engine change a day keeps the doctor at bay.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_25_01_Description: Did you know that "Rin" is the 4th most popular name for newborn girls in Japan in 2019? "Yui" is the 8th!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_25_02_Description: Did you know that hitting a hooked Survivor is called "Kebabing" in Japanese? Because it looks like slicing Kebab meat!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_25_03_Description: The Wraith is considered as the most adorable character by a part of the Japanese community. You can find some awesome fanart if you're lucky!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_26_01_Description: Rough day? Here, have some bubble tea.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_27_02_Description: All of your fan art and cosplays amaze us! Keep it up.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_27_03_Description: Help, I'm trapped in the entity realm!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_29_01_Description: Only in the games industry could you hear this sentence on the job: I vomited on the school sign and it crashed.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_29_02_Description: When we first got the audio treatment for The Plague, she made these disgusting retching sounds while holding the power. It was really horrible in an awesome way, but it was just too much for the final release.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_30_01_Description: In the sequel "Deed by Daylight", you perpetually fix generators for an orphanage while singing carols.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_30_02_Description: I'm not dead! I'm getting better! I think I'll go for a walk.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_30_03_Description: const char msg [] = {65,32,119,105,110,110,101,114,32,105,115,32,121,111,117,46}; (Editor's Note: Sometimes Remi has trouble speaking human)
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_31_01_Description: We eat a lot of chocolate in the office. Like, a lot.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_31_02_Description: During lunch break we play some DbD games. Who knows, maybe I played against YOU!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_32_01_Description: The game, the map, the game...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_33_01_Description: Did you know that The Huntress always hums a popular lullaby known to every Russian person? The lyrics are: Don’t sleep too close to the edge of the bed, or little gray wolf will come and bite your tiny flank.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_33_02_Description: During closed Alpha back in Spring 2016, Chuckles and Banshee were the prototype names for The Trapper and The Wraith.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_34_01_Description: OK, this one's gonna be the best map!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_34_02_Description: May I cleanse the very Totems I hid? Or is it considered cheating?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_35_01_Description: That feeling when you run out of pallets to use and the killer is still after you...
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_36_01_Description: We are very excited to start Dead by Daylight Year 4 with you and want to thank all the players who continue to engage with our game every day. Happy 4th anniversary!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_37_01_Description: I never thought I'd be scared back into the closet!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_38_01_Description: Programming is just a series of IF and ELSE statements.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_39_01_Description: My personal mission is to view every single piece of DavidxDwight fanart out there. They sustain me. Keep 'em coming!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_39_02_Description: To the rest of the CS team and the ACMs: I am nothing without you. Thank you for all your work over these 4 years!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_39_03_Description: I can be bribed with a good spreadsheet or pretty charts. Not pie charts though - those are heresy.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_40_01_Description: I named The Clown's perk Pop Goes The Weasel. No joke, that was my idea.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_41_01_Description: Horror games are my favorite, and I've always wanted to work on one. Working on DbD is a dream come true!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_42_01_Description: A key aspect of surviving a trial is not dying.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_42_02_Description: Take to the stars and explore new realms in the upcoming spinoff adventure, 'Hillbilly Space Program,' coming to a sloped rock near you!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_42_03_Description: When developing The Plague, we had discussions about whether to model the attack like a vomit assault rifle, a vomit flamethrower, or a vomit shotgun. Not only did 'Vomit Assault Rifle' end up being the direction we went with, it's also a great name for a band.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_43_01_Description: Let there be dead by dayLIGHT!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_43_02_Description: How many dead cows are in the game?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_43_03_Description: Connection with this quote could not be established. Please try again.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_44_01_Description: To whoever posted 'actual braindead survivor please avoid at all costs' on my Steam profile in 2018, it's still true!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_44_02_Description: The game you're playing right now was created by some of the finest developers and team I've ever met.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_44_03_Description: No, you can't put that as a quote for the 4th Anniversary.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_45_01_Description: You'd think by now I wouldn't get jump scared!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_45_02_Description: I can't wait until you guys can see [REDACTED]!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_46_01_Description: Acting Jane was an incredible experience and I am glad that I was chosen to do her voice!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_46_02_Description: Be happy, enjoy, and have fun! <3
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_47_01_Description: Fact: Diversion should be called Pebble.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_47_03_Description: I started to play Survivor when The Nurse could Blink 7 times. I like to say that I learned DBD on hard mode.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_48_01_Description: Hey, thanks a lot for playing the game!
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_48_02_Description: Good luck in your upcoming trial.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_48_03_Description: Is this the real life or is this just Entity?
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_49_01_Description: We actually play the game. But not the role you play.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_50_02_Description: I'm a terrible source of quotes.
SpecialEventLoadingTextsDB.AnniversaryQuote_50_03_Description: No, please, I don't want to add anymore quotes to the database for this event...

SpecialEvents.NoLongerAvailable: NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB

If your items, including Auric Cells, aren't received immediately after purchase, please restart the game. If the problem persists after 24 hours, please contact Customer Support through the Settings menu.
Store.FilterIncludeAllOwnedItems: Enabling this option will display all available customization for the selected character.
Store.HardCurrencyLore:
"Very little is known of The Entity's biological working and the exact purpose of the Auric Cell still eludes me.
There are nevertheless strong correlations to be made between the Cell and The Entity's faculty to shape the world that imprisons us.
Are they the primordial building blocks to everything we see within The Fog? 
Can we harness their power?" –Vigo's Notebook: "The Real Enemy"

UILocTexts.ARCHIVES_PopupArchiveEventStoryStart_MES: A new Event Tome has opened in the Archives!

UILocTexts.ARCHIVES_RiftCurrentProgressInfo_MESSAGE: Your current progress will be applied to the next Tier.

Please try again.

UILocTexts.ATLANTATUTORIAL_PopupOnboardingCurrencyB:
Want help to survive? You can use Bloodpoint to buy items and add-ons to improve them. Or you can turn the tide by getting offerings. Go to the BloodMarket to get them!
You can get more Bloodpoints by doing certain actions during a match, or through rituals.
UILocTexts.ATLANTATUTORIAL_PopupOnboardingCurrencyH: Not enough Iridescent Shards? Auric Cells also allow you to buy new characters and costumes, as well as access special events. Some characters and outfits can only be bought using Auric Cells. You can get them from Mystery Boxes and from the Auric Cell Store.
UILocTexts.ATLANTATUTORIAL_PopupOnboardingCurrencyu:
Want to customize your character’s look? Or try out a new character? Iridescent Shards allow you to do that! Go to the Customize menu to change your look.
You can get more Iridescent Shards from the BloodMarket, rituals or by leveling up.

UILocTexts.LIGHTSENSITIVITY_Content_MESSAGE:
A very small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain kinds of flashing lights or light patterns. These persons, or even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy, may experience epileptic symptoms or seizures while playing video games.

If you or any of your relatives has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before playing any video game.

IMMEDIATELY DISCONTINUE use and consult a physician if you or your child experience any of the following symptoms: dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitching, involuntary movements, loss of awareness, disorientation, or convulsions. Parents should watch for or ask their children about the above symptoms.

You may reduce risk of photosensitive epileptic seizures by taking the following precautions: sit farther from the screen, use a smaller screen, play in a well-lit room, do not play when you are drowsy or fatigued.

UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_PanelTabBloodweb:
BLOODWEB
The Bloodweb consists of randomly generated nodes which can be unlocked with Bloodpoints to earn new abilities, items, add-ons, offerings, and more.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_PanelTabCharacterKiller:
KILLERS
Each character comes with its own particular skill-set, progression path, loadout and customization options to fit your playstyle. Feel free to experiment!
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_PanelTabCharacterSurvivor:
SURVIVORS
Each character comes with its own particular skill-set, progression path, loadout and customization options to fit your playstyle. Feel free to experiment!
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_PanelTabCustomization:
CUSTOMIZE
Customize your character here with cosmetics! Additional customizations can be purchased from the store.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_PanelTabLoadout:
LOADOUT
Characters can equip up to 2 add-ons, 4 perks and 1 offering. Survivors can also equip an item.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_PanelTabStore:
STORE
Purchase new characters and cosmetics using Auric Cells and Iridescent Shards.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_SBMTallyChat5: Good luck on your next game!
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_TooltipLoadoutAddon:
Add-ons
Items and powers can be enhanced by adding up to two add-ons. For Killers, this expands their powers in a number of ways, while for Survivors it optimizes their ability to repair, heal, and interfere with the Killer.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_TooltipLoadoutItem:
Items
Survivors can equip one item per trial, and every item can be enhanced by selecting add-ons. Items can accelerate repairs, healing, and even interfere with the Killer.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_TooltipLoadoutOffering:
Offerings
Offerings alter how the game is played. They can have various effects, such as changing the number of chests, sacrificial hooks, or increasing Bloodpoint rewards.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_TooltipLoadoutPerk:
Perks
Perks are special abilities unique to Killers and Survivors. They can improve on existing abilities or offer new ways to evade, hide, heal, attack, catch, and kill.
UILocTexts.ONBOARDING_TooltipTallyBoldness:
Boldness
Interacting with the Killer and their objects

UILocTexts.PROGRESSION_SystemInfoPopup_MESSAGE:
Dead by Daylight has a new way of unlocking perks between characters!

Completing a character's 50th Bloodweb level lets you Prestige that character, giving you permanent benefits and resetting that character's Bloodweb Level to 1 so you can begin the cycle again.

The first, second, and third time you Prestige a character, the Level 1, 2, and 3 version of their perks are given to all other characters. Each Prestige after that unlocks unique portraits and cosmetics for that character.

Nothing is lost when you Prestige a character. That character retains all their purchased perks, items, add-ons, and offerings. Prestige as often as you can!

If you have invested a significant amount of bloodpoints in a character prior to this release, they may have received free prestige levels in honor of your effort. Plus, all characters that were Prestige 3 before this update were awarded with a special highlight in the Character Menu. This can be disabled in the Settings.

Have fun!
